item.title: About Me
item.description:
“Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn’t matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough.”

― Richard P. Feynman

About ME

Hi, nice to meet you. I’m Felix. I spend my days tapping keyboards and Googling. I use Stack Overflow like Tinder to find soul mates who faced the same programming problems as I do.

I enjoy engineering, designing and learning all sorts of new knowledge. In the past years, I have been lucky enough to work alongside amazing teams of talented people. My goal is to create products that can put a smile on millions and influence billions. So if you are working on something cool, also aiming to reshape the world, feel free to reach me out~

My Interest

Aside from coding, I like thinking deep philosophical questions which don’t seem to have any practical usage (But you know that’s the fun part :D ). I also enjoy drawing, designing, reading all sorts of books, watching documentaries, learning about history & psychology, messing with computer hardware, plastic models and so on.

My skills

Area Skill sets
Design Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, InDesign, After Effect, Procreate, FCX
Coding Languages C++, Java, Python, GO, C#, Ruby, R, VB.net … and More
Scripting Javascript, Python
Database PostgreSQL, BigQuery, MySQL
Web HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React
Cloud GCP (BigQuery, Dataproc, CloudSQL, Pub/Sub)
Mobile Dev iOS (Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit), Flutter
OS Unix, Linux, Windows, MacOS
Project Management Agile methodology, Scrum
Source control Git
Build/Deploy Tools Jenkins, Airflow
Game development Unity, C#
  • I have used a bunch of different programming languages, but I think the mindset to solve problems is way more crucial than how familiar you are with specific tools, just like doing math.

Projects

Check out “Projects” section for more!

CONTACT

Feel free to reach me out via Linkedin for collaboration or other discussions!
٩(◦`꒳´◦)۶
